last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 8
last_episode_to_air.overview: Today the lads are heading to Suffolk to meet Terry and Sam who are living "The Good Life" like the BBC's Tom and Barbara in the 70's sitcom. They have rescue animals and pigs and sheep and they grow most of their own food on their smallholding. But they also have sheds full of unwanted and unused stuff. Simon and Henry find rich pickings including an antique tilley lamp and a fine old work bench.

name: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
original_name: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel across the UK to find unique items lost in people's homes. Using creative thinking and elbow grease, they fix them up to turn a profit for their owners.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel across the UK to find unique items lost in people's homes to fix up for a profit.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are back, with new presenter Max McMurdo, seeking items to fix up and flog on.

seasons.name: Season 8
seasons.overview: Unlocking padlocks on the sheds, garages and barns of Britain, in the hope of making a tidy profit for their owners.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In this first episode, Henry and Simon unearth a church pew, create a fish tank from scrap and uncover a very special petrol tank.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel Britain seeking items to fix up and flog for their owners. In search of forgotten riches, in this episode the boys are in East Sussex and Hertfordshire, with finds that include a Victorian egg incubator.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel Britain seeking items to fix up and flog for their owners. In this episode they're in the West Midlands and London, with finds including a potato oven and an old petrol pump.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are here to turn them into hard cash for their owners. A water trough and a cartwheel are among the items ripe for reclamation in this episode.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are here to turn unwanted possessions into hard cash for their owners. In this episode, finds include some baby scales, an oil can and a glass cabinet ready for upcycling.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are here to turn them into hard cash for their owners. This episode's items include a clay pigeon trap, search light and Peugeot 205.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are here to turn them into hard cash for their owners. The boys are in East Sussex, and their finds include some Victorian street lamps.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Experts Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel the length of Britain to find, fix and flog unwanted possessions on behalf of their owners. A butter churn, a slot machine and a set of print trays are among the finds in this episode.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: The series that restores and makes a profit from unwanted items. Simon repurposes some old suitcases while Henry gives an old dresser some serious bling.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are here to turn them into hard cash for their owners. Some stained glass and a Victorian hay rack are among this programme's finds.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are here to turn them into hard cash. In this episode an old bureau gets a makeover on the road in Yorkshire.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel the length of Britain seeking items to fix up and flog on to make a handsome profit for their owners. This time, Simon recycles some historic oak while Henry comes unstuck when he tries to get to grips with an old Ford Escort.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel the length of Britain seeking items to fix up and flog on to make a handsome profit for their owners. In this episode, Henry gives Simon a motorcycling masterclass in Wiltshire.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: In this episode experts Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are in the Cotswolds and Somerset, where their finds include a set of milk churns and an old munitions shell.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Experts Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien find, fix and flog a huge range of possessions they unearth in the barns and garages of Britain. In this episode they celebrate Henry's birthday with some serious finds in Wensleydale, Yorkshire.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are here to turn them into hard cash. This time they're in stitches over some serious sewing machines in Kent.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel Britain seeking items to fix up and flog on to make a handsome profit for their owners. In this episode Henry monkeys around with a monkey bike while Simon uses all his skills to restore an old racing bike.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Welcome to the series that restores and makes a profit from your unwanted items. In this episode, Simon leads Henry to a barn that features an amazing collection of replica Rolls Royce cars, while Henry tries his hand at driving a tractor.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Welcome to the series that finds, fixes and flogs the best of your unwanted items. This time the boys are in York, where Henry struggles to squeeze into some motorcycle leathers and Simon gets into deep water when he tries to restore an aluminium boat.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien turn unwanted possessions into hard cash. This time, Simon takes Henry to a stately home in Somerset, where he thinks he's unearthed a bona fide Tudor relic.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel across the UK to find unique items lost in people's homes to fix up for a profit.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel the length of Britain seeking items to fix up and flog on. In this episode they restore eight items, including a pine blanket chest

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: In this episode Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien go military: Simon converts tank parts to garden furniture while Henry takes his life in his hands with a motorised skateboard. Later Simon restores a model Hurricane and Henry goes potty for a retro petrol pump.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel the length of Britain seeking items to fix up and flog on to make a handsome profit for their owners. In this episode they're in the Cotswolds competing to see who can create the most profit on two old lamps. They also take a spin in a Devonshire fire engine.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are back to make money out of your junk. In this episode Henry calls in a safe cracker to bring a safe back from the scrapheap, and a ship's wheel is left in splinters when Henry falls out with restorer Guy.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and new presenter Max McMurdo travel the length of Britain seeking items to fix up and flog, turning unwanted junk into profit. In this episode they're in Wales. Picks include: an oil dispenser, fire grate, chaise longue and even a catamaran.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The boys are in Northamptonshire and Coventry, where Henry discovers a very rare limited edition Goldwing motorbike with only 65 miles on the clock.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Simon finds some night vision goggles and an antique snooker table that's seen better days, while Henry chooses an enormous US army truck as one of his picks.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: In this episode, Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien turn an old, unloved filing cabinet into a valuable and desirable storage unit and they convert a Bakelite voltmeter into a retro Bluetooth speaker.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: In this episode the boys are in Wales picking up and restoring a dentist's table, a barber's chair and they make a coffee table out of parquet flooring.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Max upcycles a brass propeller into a stylish table lamp, while Henry goes all Victorian with an old pond yacht.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Today's restorations include an old cheese press. And a 1980s motorbike almost gets the better of biker Henry and his restorer Guy.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Max McMurdo restore and upcycle 2CV headlamps, a child's rocking horse, a Victorian streetlamp and a high chair.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Today the boys head to the fairground, collecting a bicycle made for two, a ship's search lamp and a lambing chair.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: In Gloucestershire, Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien visit landed gent Sir Benjamin Slade as they search for more upcycling prospects. Simon converts a gilded picture frame into a flat screen TV surround, while Henry refurbishes a club fender fire surround and turns a quick profit on a Fordson tractor.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Today Henry and Simon realise profit potential in an old crop sprayer, a cast iron fire guard and some old wooden workshop clamps.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Max McMurdo and Henry Cole visit a motorbike fan. Henry makes table lamps from motorbike engines, while Max turns a pallet and iron wheels into a stylish modern coffee table.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien head to Newark. Simon finds an antique European threshing board, which he turns into a coffee table and Henry's all at sea with a ships porthole.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: In this episode, Henry finds a treat for restorer Guy, and Simon creates stunning table lamps from old theatre lights.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: Henry and Simon head to a private railway. Simon converts a lantern to a stylish table, while Henry converts a fire extinguisher into a steampunk lamp.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: Max restores a pair of iconic designer chairs, while Henry restores a decrepit garden table into a colourful and valuable new one.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: The homes of Britain are stacked with unwanted possessions. Today, Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are realising profit potential in some church organ pipes and old leather sports car seats.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Today Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are in Cheshire and the Wirral restoring a 1920s dance hall lighting system, an antique butter churn, a huge theatre light and an old enamel advertising sign.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien head to Leeds and Preston in search of people's junk and clutter to upcycle into valuable new items. Today Henry makes an international set of clocks out of dashboard time pieces, while Simon builds an eccentric chandelier from car headlights.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Today the boys are close to the Malvern Hills. Henry picks two saddles from horse owner Sabrina and converts them into bar stools, while Simon makes a handsome profit on a 1960s kitchen cupboard.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Experts Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien travel the length of Britain to find, fix and flog unwanted possessions on behalf of their owners. Today they head to the Midlands. Henry's rather taken with a throne salvaged from an exotic nightclub and Simon's restoration of a Victorian doll's house doesn't go to plan.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are back, with new presenter Max McMurdo, seeking items to fix up and flog on.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien are back travelling the length of Britain seeking items to fix up and flog on, to make a handsome profit for their owners. In this episode they visit a Norman castle and restore a Fiat 500 as well as build a table from part of Southend Pier.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien search for more items to fix up and sell on, visiting Windsor to meet Pete and Phil, who rent out cars to the film and TV business. Henry finds an Austrian moped which is missing an engine, while Simon picks a fibreglass suit of armour.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien search for more items to fix up and sell on, visiting the Isle of Wight to meet a couple who have lots of unwanted militaria in their sheds. While Henry embarks on an ambitious project to turn y tank parts into hanging baskets, Simon plans to transform old insulators into studio flat lighting.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien visit Dumfries and Galloway, where they pick through a garage full of travel memorabilia and find an unloved corner unit at a charity depot.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In Leicestershire, Simon and Henry meet Bernadette, whose uncle Jim has filled every room in his house with motorbikes, cycles and everything under the sun.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Henry and Simon head to Shropshire to help Marvin and Karen with some shed decluttering. Henry lightly restores an old Ford truck, Simon eyes a '70s TV for a potential fish tank.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Today the boys head to Somerset, feeling chipper. In Wincanton they meet retired Blacksmith Gyles with a pile of stuff needing a new home. Simon chooses bellows and Henry fulfills a dream by restoring an airline food trolley.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Simon, and Henry head to Worcestershire and meet TV props dealer Craig. In a first for the show Henry chooses a vintage ice cream van whilst Simon spots a grandfather clock with no clock. What could possibly go wrong!

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Henry and Simon visit Jim's vast barn in Leicestershire. Henry takes a risk on an old Ford Prefect, untouched for decades. Simon opts for three chicken feeders, challenging his restorers to create the most innovative upcycle.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The boys head to Leicestershire for a furniture-filled shed belonging to Matthew, a French pieces enthusiast. Simon chooses a huge canoe, while Henry picks a gymnasium vaulting horse. But what will they become?

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Simon and Henry head to Wiltshire. Henry is feeling happy because they're going to an old WWII airfield. Simon decides to restore a 1970's caravan while Henry ignores the automotive things and opts for a boat!

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: The boys visit Norfolk to assist retired engineer Graham and his wife Lindsay. They discover a rare tandem disability scooter, along with treasures like a mid-century Ercol cabinet and a retro record player in need of some TLC.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Today the lads are heading to Suffolk to meet Terry and Sam who are living "The Good Life" like the BBC's Tom and Barbara in the 70's sitcom. They have rescue animals and pigs and sheep and they grow most of their own food on their smallholding. But they also have sheds full of unwanted and unused stuff. Simon and Henry find rich pickings including an antique tilley lamp and a fine old work bench.

8.name: Season 8
8.overview: Unlocking padlocks on the sheds, garages and barns of Britain, in the hope of making a tidy profit for their owners.
